categories.name: Action

categories.description: Games that involve combat between characters or teams.

categories.description: Games designed to scare or unsettle players with a focus on suspense and atmosphere.

slider.title: The Witcher 3: Wild Hunt

games.title: Clostrophobia Vol 1 TENOKE
games.description: The game is a hybrid maze crawler / first person shooter with time manipulation, set inside a claustrophobic air duct filled with deadly traps and unpredictable enemies. You must carefully mark your path and avoid the many obstacles laid out for you all while evading or killing whatever is hunting you inside the maze.
